text: Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, a'molason hamcun saroʙe dar ʙijoʙone hamvor ast, ki [az dur insoni] tasna onro oʙ mepindorad, to on ki nazdikas mesavad [va] cize namejoʙad va [a'moli kofir niz saroʙest, ki sude ʙarojas nadorad va dar ivaz] Allohro nazdi xes mejoʙad, ki hisoʙasro ʙa tavri komil medihad va Alloh taolo dar hisoʙrasi sare' ast
